title: [Large-Scale] Mastery Course in Business English Communication Through Online Real-Time Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic business terminology, knowledge of fundamental English grammar
context.additional_context: Targeting learners in managerial/leadership positions with beginner-level language proficiency. Conducted in an environment with provided digital devices (laptops, tablets, etc.) integrated with real-time video conferencing systems and LMS (Learning Management Systems)

learning_goals: Learners can enhance English communication skills for business scenarios through online real-time discussions and role-playing.

Learners can establish 2 language use strategies tailored to their work environment through 4 weekly feedback sessions and 3 peer evaluations, apply them for 4 weeks, and receive ≥4/5 effectiveness ratings from peers.

Learners can perform 3 simulated presentations for global work environments (e.g., international conferences, overseas client meetings) and achieve "excellent" ratings in ≥4 out of 5 evaluation criteria (presentation structure, nonverbal communication, technical term accuracy) based on peer reviews and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
